message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great opportunity to purchase my product.  I think it would be perfect for you and I'm asking for $11,500. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I am willing to pay $10,000 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your position, but $10,000 is too low for me.  Could you do $11,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am comfortable offering $10,500.
